item.title: DeSantis's Ringling Museum plan scares off donors, threatening $750K.
item.description: When Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis proposedtransferring The John and Mable Ringling Museum of Artfrom Florida State University to New College of Florida earlier this year, museum supporters warned the move would scare away donors.

item.title: Video: Heckler calls Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis a "nazi"
item.description: Florida Gov.Ron DeSantis put Manatee County front and centeron Thursday, July 24, inhis effort to impose DOGE-styled, state scrutiny and potentially mandated budget cuts on local governments across the state.
